text:
JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong – Macau Family Accommodation Package, including free ferry tickets Published on : Wednesday, September 23, 2015
Starting from now until 31 March 2016, JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong is introducing an attractive accommodation package to complement an enticing family getaway. Take advantage of up to *2 economy class ferry tickets from HongKong to Macau as part of the deal, offering theopportunity to further combine the best of both cities for an enriching experience.
The Hong Kong – Macau package also includes an upgrade to the Premier Harbour View Roomto indulge in style with free in-room internet connectivity and breakfast for two adults and onechild below 12 years. Package starts from HK$3,300 per room per night.JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong is located in the prestigious Pacific Place complex on Hong Kong Island, with direct access to over 150 retail shops and a Cineplex in the Pacific Place Shopping Mall, and only a two minute walk to the nearest MTR (Mass Transit Railway) and one stop away from famous Tsim Sha Tsui shopping belt. The hotel is also in close proximity to a host of cultural landmarks and world-class attractions, including one of the city’s top familyamusement parks, Ocean Park only 15 minutes by car from the hotel.
Macau is situated on the western side of the Pearl River Delta across from Hong Kong, and offers an excellent array of Macanese food, world heritage sites and many other exciting attractions for the family to discover. The ferry ride is only an hour’s journey.
Source:- JW Marriott Hotel
